name: What's for dinner?
description:
Made for GMTK game jam 2022
Theme : Roll of the Dice

———

😈 What's for dinner?

Keep feeding the demon and keep his satisfaction high !

Take his orders and try to match his requests.

But there is a trick , the only way to summon ingredients from your cursed fridge is by rolling a dice.

If you are satisfied with the ingredients you summoned, DICE IT to mix them up, compute their mean score and serve the dish to the demon.

Otherwise TRASH IT and try to summon a better combination. BEWARE, the demon will get impatient!

———

⌨️ Controls

Play with you keyboard and mouse!

— Space bar to roll the dice

— Mouse click to press buttons

———
